content.detailedDescription: Approximately in july i was in my backyard and i saw what appeared to me at the time a possible blimp with flashing red, green and amber lights. i live in a neighborhood where all the street names end in dale. we are in the neighborhood across from boulder station casino. i have consistently seen up to three of these objects which flash the same kind of lights. i have actually seen one move horizontally and stop and then followed it up the street as it moved horizontally south like toward utah. then i spoke to neighbors who i don't know and they said they see them all the time and pointed more of these objects out to me. i live in the southeast part of las vegas, nevada. i have no sense of direction but i can drive straight up nellis and will come to nellis afb. i have contacted channel 3, was told it is a blimp, have emailed george knapp who never responeded , spoken to a lvmpd motorcycle officer who spent ten minutes telling me he is sure it is a helicopter. i ahve many other witnesses who i have made come out to see these lights. we all see them. i now see them every night always they are in place as soon as it is dark. they are not stars. i have tried to photograph them. i have tried to see them through binoculars. i don't have the right equipment. here's the thing. i drove to a shopping center parking lot near my house and i could barely see one behind a tree. these are to low to be seen by all of vegas i guess. i even contacted a channel 3 cameraman who is acquainted with my mom and he really showed no interest. anything you can come up with that it might be does not fit. it (they) are not lights on a mountain, weather balloons or whatever. here's what i have decided they are but of course how can i possibly prove it. i think they are some kind of survelliance drones sent out by nellis afb. i do see one often in the same location as if it is watching maccarron airport which i'm sure you know is the big airport for las vegas. the one closet to me which i see in the same place nearly every night seems to be over the las vegas strip. i am an intelligent person and by now know when something in the sky is not a normal flying machine. maybe you know what it is. maybe alot of people know what it ( they) are. but i do not.
content.summary: Don't beleive it is a ufo

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were sitting in our living room watching a movie and she looked past me and said what is that. i turned and seen the bright light, we then both ran outside and it was gone. we heard no noises or anything. it was moving slow when we saw it.
content.summary: Bright circular light moving slowly over top of the trees and when we ran outside it was gone

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a cigarette about 730pm ,i noticed a bright red light in the sky to the north .I watched it for a min or two till my cigarette was done ,it didnt move the whole time only flashed its lights like 1,2,3 1,2,3 then quicker then more steady again for a little longer duration then quick again . i called my son out to see it ,and he said its a blimp.And went back inside .I watched it a bit longer still not moving now its been about ten mins  i observed this,and a neighbor walking his dog passed and i asked him what he thought it was. we were both puzzled ,then his daughter came home and asked what were we looking at, and she was just as baffled. now it started to have a green light flash once in while with the red and was drifting a little.I asked my wife to come out and she was shocked too.Then it drifted right and left a couple of times ,then it drifted in a northeast direction, much faster ,maybe as fast as a plane or a little faster..A very bright star was in sky just to the south of the path it took.
content.summary: Went outside for a smoke ,spotted it up in sky, bright red pulsating never seen a plane or helicopter with only red lights ,i watched it for a min.Or two and called my son ,then me and 2 neighbors watched it for another 15 mins ,

content.detailedDescription:
At 10:15 pm, just after my band had finished practicing, my guitarist, my keyboardist, my cousin and myself were standing outside having a conversation when my guitarist pointed up into the sky as the biggest meteor ive ever seen streaked across the sky from ne to sw for about 3-4 seconds. the meteor was so close and bright that bits of debris and flames were visible. thinking nothing of it we continued our conversation when approximately 1 minute after the meteor i looked up and saw a triangle of lights directly over us flying silently in the exact same path, from ne to sw, as the meteor. the object was moving quickly but from the moment we saw it till it finally disappeared into the horizon took about 15-20 seconds.  
the meteor may be a coincidence, but i figured i might as well include it.
content.summary: Triangle of lights

content.detailedDescription:
this is a strange story but interesting none the less so i thought i should share it to see if anybody could do anything with it. i have a video tape of my great grandma from when i was kid. she was sitting around with her sisters talking about old stories from when they were kids. one sister started talking about a story her father, my great great grandpa made her promise to never talk about, but since she was over 90 years old she didn't think it mattered anymore. she was very flustered still just talking about it. the best we can tell, this event took place in the logansport, indiana area in approximately the 1890's or so, maybe earlier, maybe later.  

my great aunt was taking food to her father and grandfather working the fields all day as she did every day. she would take a horse and cart out to where they were working, have lunch, then come back home. on this particular day, she could not find her father, or grandfather. she then heard them yelling at her to get inside the woods nearby and hide. she complied and that's where they began telling her that they have been watching some sort of flying machine that didn't make any sort of noise flying around the field. they supposedly watched little people get out of the craft and take pieces of corn and soil, then they flew away. the uncle and father had been hiding in the woods for some time afraid to leave. 

all the people in the video have now passed on, but my grandma who is now in her mid 80's, the daughter in the story's niece, gave me this tape because she was curious if i could find any other reports from that time frame of anybody reporting the same sort of thing. i have the tape of the story, and that's about it. it's just a story, but interesting
content.summary: Old story on a video tape from my great grandma

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving through nebraska maybe around 2 or 3 am, maybe earlier. i noticed the sky was very clear and it was cold, maybe 29 or 30. i saw a flash that looked like lightening. i was headed east on highway 80 at mile marker 335. i looked out to the left to see if there was a storm coming and a giant flaming multiple colored ball of light with a long bright colorful bluish green white in the center tail was following what appeared to be a large object on fire.  i followed it with my eyes as did my husband and after it was out of sight the gaseous cloud seemed to hang in the air like a low jet stream almost at my eye level like fog. then as we looked back it looked like a contained explosion with a blue dome keeping it in had hit the ground out in the darkness. i was hoping nobody was hurt and what exactly i saw. i've seen shooting stars, visited planetariums, watched meteor showers and done recreational research mainly to teach my son about space and the solar system and i have never seen anything like this. i chalked it up to a possible comet collision but it seems different for some reason. i was in awe asking myself what the hell was that and repeating wow for hours. that's why i looked and found this.  this was way to close to be a shooting star. in addition we did see four normal shooting stars along the same stretch before and after this other object. it looked like the lunar module entering the atmosphere in the movie apollo 13. it came from the above right and seemed to curve with the atmosphere of earth. strange. hope to hear from you.
content.summary: I saw the exact same thing the other mans son described but i believe i wasn't close enough to feel or hear any crash landing.

content.detailedDescription: While driving through the desert on i-8 from the city of el centro, ca towards the city of ocotillo, ca at around 10:15 p.M. on september 13, 2011, my daughter noticed some kind of electric fog coming out of the sand and everywhere we looked. it was electric bluish in color for what she asked me, "mom, what is that?" i responded; "i don't know honey, in 25 years that i lived in this area, this is the first time i see anything like this." i was driving at a speed of 78 m/h and was tired. i asked her to find a hair clip to hold my bangs up because they were bothering me on my eyes. while she was digging in her purse, a strange whitish-grayish sphere wearing some kind of bluish gown swoop down from north to south in front of my windshield for what i yelled, "did you see that?" my daughter responded, "i was busy looking for the hair-clip in my purse, what it was?" i didn't want to scare her, so i responded "oh, nothing. it must have been a shooting star." she kept digging in her purse when the thing came back, now from south to north, swooping down to about one foot away from my windshield, for what i had the same reaction. i yield; "did you see that again?" then she angrily answer "how do you want me to see anything if i am looking for that **** hair clip for you?" "well, just pay attention. forget about that clip, because i have the suspicion that thing is coming back" i said. at that moment the sphere swoop down again in front of the windshield, but this time hovering in front of us at the same speed we were driving for a few seconds, it felt like the thing was trying to stop us or scare us out of the road. it looked like a crystal sphere and the edge was glowing with some kind of grayish electricity. a gown was covering it, also transparent of a whitish-bluish color. to me the gown resembled casper the friendly ghost. my daughter was scared, so she said a prayer to god, and when se said the name of jesus christ, the whole atmosphere that was surrounding us vanished. i would like to say, this is the third time i have a paranormal experience on this area of california.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb swoops down in front of my windshield 3 times while driving east to north on i-8

content.detailedDescription:
I was just going to bed and happened to glance out the window.  my window faces due east.  i didn't have my glasses on but i noticed a blurry bright saucer shape off in the distance about 30 to 40 degrees above the horizon.  it looked like it could have been 1/2 mile in diameter.  so, i ran for my glasses and when i put them on i realized it was a cloud bank, about 3 to 4 miles away, and it seemed to be glowing from within.  then i realized it must be moonlight glowing from behind the cloud.  but the rest of the sky was full of stars. 

i thought it was pretty so i stood looking then after a couple minutes a bright white star sized object dropped down from beneath the cloud.  it seemed to have a red light flashing on it's south side  the object came to rest about 100 to 200 feet beneath the cloud then expanded to about 10 times it original size.  it held this size for about 15 seconds then shrank to it's original size then disappeared.  the light reappeared a few seconds later, in the same spot, still flashing white and red, then winked out again.  it reappeared a few minutes later in a different spot in the sky at the same height, hovered for a couple of minutes then winked out and didn't come back.
content.summary: Star like object dropped out of cloud

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
At 23:58 on saturday 10-8-11, i was smoking a cigar by the pool in my apartment complex when the security guard on duty came running by shouting to follow him quickly. when we arrived at a clearing, we saw orange lights hovering in the sky, moving in very slow formation. by the time i was able to get my cell phone to record the event, we counted 7 objects in the sky. they seemed round and bright orange and seemed to dim out and disappear. duration was about 2 minutes. two minutes later, at 00:00 10-9-11, we saw a single ufo moving toward us slowly. it was closer this time. the best description i can give is that it looked like a rectangular orange lantern floating in the sky even though we knew definitely that it wasn't a lantern. it was longer vertically and at the center was a brighter spherical light, perhaps the craft itself. the rectangular shape was more like a light surrounding the craft and not the craft itself. it soon dimmed out and with the naked eye we could still see, faintly, the spherical center moving across the sky. almost like it turned the light off that gave it a rectangular aura. then it disappeared. at 00:05 10-9-11, another single ufo appeared and seemed to float across the sky before dimming out again. again orange and like a rectangular lantern with a brighter spherical core. there was never any sound. there was no wind, the night was relatively clear with low cloud in certain parts. when the singular craft moved toward us at 00:00, we could also make out a kind of reflection of white light behind it on the bottom of the cloud. almost like if one would shine a headlight up toward the cloud. i have posted the videos i took from my droid3 phone onto youtube. the cell phone videos don't do justice to what we saw with our own eyes. but at least it was recorded! here are the links for your review. i couldn't figure out a way to send it via email because the file sizes are too big. i work in sales/promotions for the los angeles times and the security guard was an mp in the army during his tour in iraq. hope that helps!

[links moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 7 orange lights/ufo's slowly moving in night sky on 10-8-11 23:58 redondo beach, ca

content.detailedDescription:
First off let me say i am 46 years old and have served in the navy back in the 80's ad 90's as an f-14 mechanic. i have been exposed to just about every type of military aircraft and their general capabilities. i am also a cessna private pilot. with that being said what i observed tonight while sitting on my back patio went against every type of known aircraft i have been exposed to including any on tv. 

at 2037 hours (8:37pm) i was smoking a cigarette on my back patio sitting in my chair facing directly west. out of the corner of my right eye i caught a movement and turned my head to the right and saw what initially appeared to me to be a flock of birds glowing pure white flying due south. about 2 seconds after my initial observation i thought to myself wait a minute, its nighttime and birds don't glow in the dark. 

i then realized what i was observing was some sort of aircraft that was in the shape of a boomerang that had on the front leading edges of the aircraft approximatley 15-20 white lights from wing tip to wing tip including the center. at that time it was now directly in front of me traveling in a due south course following highway 347 almost to the center of my town. i live in a small town. i estimate based on my military and private pilot experience it was traveling around 500 knots. it passed to my left and i was not able to observe any red or green anti-collision lights or the required white tail light.   

in my experience i knew a military type aircraft flying at this speed would have some tailtale sign of emmission from the tailpipes and none was observed. i was approximately 1/4 to no more then 1/2 mile from this object that appeared to be the size of a standard size house i estimate its altitude to have been around 1,000-1,500 feet. it made zero sound. when it was in my center field of vision i could see clearly it was a boomerang shaped aircraft that had a very dark skin color that caused it to contrast with the night sky and allow its shape to be easily seen as it flew by. 

this aircraft traveled for another 4-5 seconds and then made a very abrubt course change to a westerly course from its southern course. this course change caused me at that time to lose any sight of the aircraft. it appeared to follow the union pacific railroad line going west. 

i called my sister inlaw who lives about 3 blocks to my west as it appeared to have changed course right over her house and asked her if she was outside smoking and did she see any object fly by. she stated she was outside at that time but did not see or hear any aircraft. she was under her patio cover so if it went over her house she would not have been able to see it. 

i immediately called luke airforce base 556th fighter squadron and inquired as to whether they were currently conducting any night time operations in this area or the barry goldwater range about 40 miles southwest of me and the duty officer stated no, they were not currently conducting any operations in our area. note: we sometimes see lukes f-16 fly over us on there way to the range but it is always in the day time and not at night. i gave the duty officer a brief of what i observed and he entered it into his duty log. 

i then called my local police dispatch and inquired if anybody including any of the on duty patrol officers had reported any unidentified aircraft flying over town at a low altitude in the last 15 minutes and she respinded that they have not received any other reports at that time. i gave her a quick brief of my observation. 

closing comments: i have never seen an unidentified flying object before and this is the first time i have ever made a report on one to anybody. i was not drinking and i am of sound mind. i have usually laughed about other people alleged sightings including one my brother and mother reported to me awhile back. what i saw tonight was not anything i have ever seen before and the flight capabilities were not of anything i have seen in my f-14 experience or in other military jet aircraft i have been exposed to. its ability to make such an abrubt course change defies newton law of an object in motion stays in motion. we currently don't have any known advance technology to effect that sort of abrupt course change. if this was infact a secret military test aircraft then i would say we have advanced significantly in our technology and have somehow been able to develope structual technology that is able to resist high g-force levels both positive and negative.  

what disproves this theory to me is it takes a lot of energy to make such a turn and it requires extremely strong flight controls to force such an abrupt course change and that would have caused the aircraft to emit some level of noise and this aircraft was extremely quite. it would have caused a significant amount of stress on the airframe and on the flightcrew.
content.summary: Dark boomerang object with about 15-20 white lights in front

content.detailedDescription: My cousin seen something he tried to point it out another guy from across the street happened to be walking by he spotted it pointed it out to me i could see it after that it looked like a boomerang almost pointed with a rounded forward edge kind of like a light shadow or a cloud but there was no clouds and it was moving pretty fast my estimate was over the northwest corner of fresno within 2/3 minutes probably about 15/20 thousand feet up and about an 8th-1/4 mile wide
content.summary: My cousin seen something in the sky eat. 15,000 feet i couldn't see it he called a guy across the street he came over n pointed it out i saw it n estimated distance

content.detailedDescription: This evening as we were sitting on our patio looking at the sky we observed a star like object that was moving rapidly through the sky. it moved in an arc pattern and came up over our garage area and went down and  out of sight on the other side of the roof. it did not leave a trail. but it looked way to big and bright to be a falling star.
content.summary: A star like object, in an arc like pattern, moved acrossed our sky this evening.

content.detailedDescription: Check it out if you have access to the end of the 1st game of the world series.
content.summary: N the ending of the game and the shot of the beautiful shot of the saint louis arch. first game of the world series there are series of 6 anomalies flying behind the arch and bldgs -do not look like aircrafts.   maybe the ufos are cardinals fans

content.detailedDescription:
On october 16, 2010 in mesa, az around 6:50 pm, i saw what i thought may be a plane with a single head-light heading directly towards me from the south-west.  as the object came closer to my location, the light was getting brighter and it was beginning to take on an appearance like a bright huge star with intense lighting.  i had been getting into the habit of taking pictures of all jets or planes that head towards me at night, and i also continue taking pictures of the light until i either see a strobe lights, green or red lights, or flashing lights to indicate if it is a jet, plane, or helicopter.  this ufo's light had a constant lighting with no flickering in lighting intensity.   i continued to take pictures of this object as it was coming closer towards me.  as it was almost overhead, i  noticed that the object appeared to be changing its coarse very slightly in a wide curve like it was now going to start heading north.  however, when the object was almost directly  overhead, it then started to head directly east.  not once did i hear any noise coming from it nor did i seen any strobe lights, green or red lights, or any kind of flashing lights coming from this object.  the object  was high in the sky where high flying commercial jets are normally seen.  the object traversed at a speed similar to a slow flying plane.  the bright light remained constant bright as it came towards me, above me, and while it traveled away from. when the object was about 2 miles away as it traveled away from me, the object's lighting instantly disappeared like a light switch was turned off.  no lights were seen after that. 

in the beginning, i took many pictures at 1600 iso with the shutter speed set at  1/60 sec.  when object started going away from me less than a mile, i then set the shutter speed to 1 second which i was able to include a building's 2 story roof with the object in the same picture. i also tried to include some stars in with the ufo for reference size of the object. to me, the object size seemed to be about the same size of these jet or plane lights we normally see at night.  if i had to guess to the actually size of the object, possibly as big as a plane or jet for the height i seen the object at. the lighting also looked similar to arc-welding type of light with the same intensity.  the object definitely appeared to look like it was traversing inside our atmosphere.  during the beginning of the sighting, i noticed 1 jet or plane in the air at the same time.  shortly after the sighting of the object, there seems to be a lot of air traffic which i seen at least 5 jet or plane heading in the same direction the object was last seen.  then very briefly, (maybe 1 or 2 seconds) i saw another bright object very bright like the first object about 1/2 mile away, but it quickly disappeared before i could get a picture of it when the object was lit.  i took two pictures quickly where i thought i last seen the object at 1 second exposure. 
  then about 43 minutes later, i saw a white light that was bright for 1 second, then dim down but not completely off, then brighten back up.  it didn't strobe or flash, just bright white light then dim down then dim up to bright light which it did continuously. no other types of navigation lights were seen.  i manage to get some pictures of that sighting.  it possible that sight may be a jet, but the lighting was not typical for a jet that i normally see flying that usually strobe, flash, and have green, red, or white lights.
the sky was clear, no clouds were seen.  stars seem especially crisp. no wind. temperature about 85 degrees  fahrenheit.

  i manage to get several pictures of the objects with no lighting wiggles at 1/60 sec.  the 1 second exposure shows the constant bright lighting output even when the camera was not held steady enough in the hands. just to note: if i had it the camera on a tripod for 1 second, it would had just shown a white light line. the object was so bright that you  can see purplish colors on the outer parts of the object which usually indicates intense lighting.  not only that, because the object was so bright and at 1 second exposure, i had artifacts (ghost images) of the object in the same picture of some of the pictures i took; that usually occurs only with an extremely bright lighting.
content.summary: Low and slow star-like object traversing from sw to e, then light instantly disappears after traversing 1 mile distant away from me.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard smoking a cigarette when a glowing yellow sphere appeared suddenly and rapidly descended horizontally in a manner similar to a "shooting star".  it was several times larger than any star, and left no trail. as it fell, it expanded to at least twice it's original size.  this led me to believe that it was indeed no shooting star.  it then disappeared as suddenly as it appeared.  it made no audible sound and was presumably a considerable distance away from where i was standing.  the whole event was less than 5 seconds in duration.  my first impression after the event was that i had witnessed something other than a meteorite, comet, etc entering the atmosphere and being incinerated as it did so.
content.summary: Large glowing yellow sphere fell, expanded

content.detailedDescription:
In reference to mufon case #32715 
joliet illinois last night at about 7:00 pm i was driving south down larkin ave after doing some grocery shopping. i noticed something in the sky that at first looked like the moon trying to come through the clouds. kind of a domed shape shining behind the clounds. as i kept driving i noticed this thing was actually moving. i got out my phone and started recording this thing. at this point and from my view it looked almost like a large domed shaped object but not defined like i said it looked like it was a very bright glowing object behind the clouds but then agian it wasn't, it's just hard to explain what i was seeing. it was moving too fast to be a blimp but too slow to be a plane or a helicopter so i decided to try and follow it and as i drove down larkin to route 6 i just couldn't keep up with it but with that said it was no longer behind the clouds and appeared that it could be a blimp but then i thought, in this weather, at this time....No, and it was glowing, the whole thing was lit up, a blimp doesn't do that. by the time i turned the corner onto route 6 and heading west it seemed to be flying south west and over exxon mobile refinery off of 55 possibly and then it seemed to head south and then a little east. i soon lost interest and headed home, during the drive home i phoned my husband and told him what i saw and that i recorded the sighting. when i got home and reviewed what i recorded on my phone all you could see was the reflection of my window and the glaring street lights. today after finding this article i went to get my phone and look at the recording again but unfortunately it was nowhere to be found on my phone and i know i did not erase it, soooooo i don't know what that's about. all i know is i saw something and i don't think it was of this world.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Blimp shaped ufo over joliet illinois

content.detailedDescription: I opened my front door to let some cool air in. i walked outside to show my 2 year old the big dipper. i noticed a larger than normal light hovering in the west sky. i opened google sky maps to identify the object. it began moving east at a slow pace. i told my wife to come see this. there were airplanes in the area and we could obviously distinguish the difference between this object and the airplanes. as it moved east the light began to fade. i work in aviation and could tell the light was in our atmosphere and obviously not a typical aircraft.
content.summary: Hovering light moved. too big to be a star.

content.detailedDescription: Five luminous objects flying in formation v, together with constant acceleration. some objects, accelerated and then returned to training
content.summary: Five luminous objects flying north southward

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke at 5:00 a.M. and turned my head to look out the window from my bed.  i noticed that it was completely dark, as if the street lights had gone out on the street behind my backyard.  i then saw a yellow-orange orb in my backyard aprox. 150-200 feet from my house.  i looked at the clock and noted the time, then closed my eyes for a moment.  i looked again and saw that the light was still there so i got out of bed and moved the sheer curtains aside to take a better look.  i saw an orb that was yellow-orange - it was stationary in my backyard (below the tree line).  it seemed a little fuzzy (or because my eyes were tired), so i closed one eye and tried to focus on it.  i realized that it was not my neighbors back porch light, nor a flashlight, nor an interior light from someones house, nor a street light.  it was a yellow-orange circular light in my backyard close to the ground.  i was really tired, and didn't think about what else it could be, so i got back in bed and fell asleep for another 20 minutes.  i then awoke at 5:30 and looked again, the orb was gone, but the street lights were once again lite on the road behind my yard.  

after going back to sleep, and waking at 6:30 i told my husband the story of the strange light in the backyard at 5am.  it rained all day on the 19th, but i went out in the far backyard to take a look.  i did not see anything out of the unusual, but then again i don't know what i'm looking for.  

let me tell ya... if this happens again, i'm waking up my husband and we're going outside to research.  cause now i can't stop thinking about it.
content.summary: Yellow-orange orb stationary in backyard at 5:00 am

content.detailedDescription: This evening around 7:30 pm on oct. 19, 2011 i was outside in front my smoking cizar. my house face southwest, i look small mid size plane with pro's> went knowes a single light oject coming fast behind< i thu it another but going at the frist real fast i thu was going hit it< it slow down and got right on the first plane tail then back off. oject did this three. got on the plane tail, and then rear right left slow.The plane keep going southwest, and oject left west. the oject was only a blinding light(white light)i had to put my old email because wouldnt let me emial you
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: The object was only a one blinning white light

content.detailedDescription:
Now it was tuesday very early morning october 18, 2011, again i was on my way to work that morning, while i was riding on the cta north shore purple line train; which was at the break of dawn around 6:30pm. i was heading up towards the cta howard station, i happen to look out the window and ive seen several strange looking lights up in the sky towards the east over by lake michigan. 

this time, ive gotten my old blue digital aptek pocket video camcorder with me, and i finally have got it on film believe it or not. hope that these video clips would help out with this investigation.

please let me know the out come of this ufo business out over by lake michigan, and tell me what is going on here! i hope that i am not trying to get any attention but this is what i keep on seeing from time to time in the mornings on my way to work.

note i tried sending the file links but the files were either too or too big to send.
please copy and past the links to the youtube website page 

[links moved to field investigator section/cms/tg] 

thank you very much
content.summary: Again a few objects hovering over lake michigan

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my boyfriend were heading home from the lighthouse mall a little after sundown. it was a chilly, windy, fall evening. the sky was dark blue with few visible stars but bits of clouds in which had a dark burnt orange hew to them.  

my boyfriend was driving.  he noticed a glowing object in the sky and pointed it out to me. it was about the size of a blimp.  it was bright. it radiated a whitish, somewhat blue color and it was a ovalish, fat-disk shape.  it almost seemed like it illuminated the immediate area around it as well. it reminded me of a glow stick. there were no "lights" shining down or onto it or anything else... the entire surface of the object was emitting a soft, but strong, glowing light.

i thought it maybe just a blimp lit up like a lantern, but it wasn't.  there were no letters or signs... the light was too bright for them to be visible anyway. plus it wasn't a fat blimp shape.  it was a bit more elongated and skinnier, like a disk, but not so flat.  there was no soil outline of the object.  the light was too bright to see that. it moved smooth and straight like a blimp would but faster. 

we raced threw town, following it, attempting to catch up. he rolled threw stop signs and sped a bit.  he was so excited, very loud, freaking out cause we might be actually seeing something crazy. he wanted to stop and buy a camera, i insisted that we did not because we will loose it! he kept repeating "how can nobody else see this?!?" i had to remind him to keep some of his attention to the road. we kept loosing sight of it because of the trees along the road blocking our view.

it was moving south, or away from the lake at a steady speed.  it was traveling maybe 30-40 miles an hour.  we got really close to it when it was above the wooded area behind a jewel osco. i'm sure someone in the area could have look straight up at it from their back yard!    

we hopped onto us-20 and it seemed to be following i-94, now traveling west. now it was traveling about 60-70 miles an hour.  it was farther away from us.  it was also higher in the sky. but now we were able to get a good long look at the entire object.  the color was more white now and then we defiantly seen a red light on top of the object and then another red light on bottom.    

we got off of us-20 and passed over i-94. we found a field an pulled over and watched the object continuing to head west.   it moved out of veiw into the porter/chesterton area.

when we got home, my boyfriend regretted not chasing it.  we told a friend.  he agreed what we described did sound odd.  we did not report it to anyone else.  my boyfriend did make the comment "if's funny how we see something so strange but act like nothing happen."

i researched blimps and light and did not pull up anything other than ufo sightings.  but no photographs similar to what i saw.  i thought it was kinnda odd tho, there were simular stories around the same time last year?
content.summary: Glowing blimp-like object with two red lights, one on top, the other on bottom over michigan city, in

content.detailedDescription: It started while i was at ft.Lyons correc.Facilty 2008/2010 while looking at the nite sky i would see certain stars move in circles or up and down or left to right or right to left! i all so saw things that i call flopy discs that look like pancakes moveing in the wind.This all happend at nite.This would happen every nite .The number of stars moveing at the same time varied.After my release in 2010 i returned to denver.On my first nite out i was seeing the same thing! it has continued to the present.With the exception of the 10/17 sighting of the stars? moveing in a different way and that was in loose groups of 2-3 from south to north.
content.summary: Look like stars were moving south to north

content.detailedDescription: on the evening of friday, oct 14 2011, i was at a friends wedding rehearsal, as i was to be one of the grooms. i was carrying something through the gate that led to where our ceremony was to take place, when i overheard some of the other attendees standing along the right side of the gate entrance. as i passed by them, i overheard one of them saying something about ufos out of my right ear, and i continued to head toward my destination to set whatever i was carrying down. i returned to the gate to fraternize with everyone and looking at them, i had realized that they were all looking in congregation to the southeast. so i looked in the same direction, as one of my friends was informing me that there was some kinda blue disc-type object moving around the tops of the trees. around 5 to 10 seconds of looking i saw a bright, neon-blue object streak an arch above the tree tops, about 30 degrees above my level to the southeast, maybe 125 yards away. it was moving in a northeasterly direction when i witnessed it, but according to my friend who had witnessed it before my being involved, it had been hanging around that area for the last couple of minutes. he described to me a bright blue orb or disc shaped object making arcs just visible on the tops of the trees, and he wasnt sure if there were two of them or just the one. he also said that on one pass, it seemed to stop at the height of its arc for a second, then continued to finish its arc-ward motion. i saw that the object was so bright, that as it made its vertical semi-circular arcing motion, it left a wall of tracer. after it dipped back toward the tops of the trees, it left my visibility, but some were saying that they could still see it through the trees making its way around the top of the immediate area of the woods. not sure what it was exactly, but it certainly wasnt any kids toy or remote controlled airplane, because it was big enough that if there were any conventional means of flight being applied, we would have heard it at that distance. but it was totally silent. and i doubt any one is flying super-bright, orb shaped, neon lit kites on a non-windy day in the woods of all places.
content.summary: Bright (neon) blue glowing orb moving up and down about the tree tops

content.detailedDescription:
story from my son who lives a half mile south of me on my property.
we always watch the sky and most all meteorite showers so we know what a meteorite looks like in most cases. we even know the content colors from the burning. we have had several hit close by over the years. this was a bit different.

he was three miles sw of columbus on hyway 30 going west when there was a laarge flash and his vehicle began stuttering and blinking on and off. then it straightened out.
   upon reaching his home he saw the ground getting lighter almost like daylight, through the window he saw the meteorite fly past overhead directly over my farmhouse completely lighting up the farm a half mile north of his location with hundresd of smaller meteorites. then as it went behind the farm he heard/felt a thump and saw a brighter flash silloweting the farm. all the while the smaller bits were comming down as well in an area spreading out over a quarter mile or so either side of the trail left by the big one. the smokey trail that it left was oddly zigzagged and floated off with the wind.
 he said that it was rainbow colored and that was the odd part. the little pieces stopped shortly after. all together the event at his house lasted between 15 to thirty seconds.
   at the same time i woke up at the farm and thought my 12 year old had fallen out of bed. i was up for a while but did not see the lights or know really what woke me.


thats it. we have meteorite in the field north of us, b ut i think finding it would be rough. in case you get other reports of odd lights in the area check to seee the direction and the time. i may have the answer to them.

also the flash that effected the truck was an odd occuance if it too was a chunk of meteorite don't you think?
content.summary: Meteorite-large ,with hundreds of little ones came down within 1 mile north of location, in a corn field most likely, with a thump and flash

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving and exited i-70 at the lee's summit exit heading east and pulled up to the stoplight on lee's summit road. my vehicle was the only one at that intersection.  the light was red.  some movement in the road caught my attention- it was located to my left in the center part of the road.  it was a dull black sphere about the size of a basketball or a little larger. it had no lights or windows or any features on it at all.  the object was floating just a few inches above the road and moving in a straight line right along the middle of the street. it's shadow was cast on the road from the streetlights. the object passed in front of my car at a slow rate, and kept going along the road heading south and to my right, then just disappeared. the object did not fade out, it literally disappeared and was no longer visible. i watched it for approximately one minute, which was long enough to get a good look at it.  my 18-year-old son was with me riding in the passenger side of the vehicle and he saw it, too, and said, "uh, mom, what the heck is that?" 
i've never seen anything like it but the first thing that i thought it could be was a ufo, however, it might have been something else entirely.
content.summary: Black orb floated along the street in front of me

content.detailedDescription:
First my primary language is french so i'll try to do my best to explain it correctly. thank you 

i first went to the beach at pointe-lebel. pointe-lebel is a small village just next to the small city of baie-comeau. so i went there with my girlfriend to chill out a little bit. i go there like twice a week for about 2 years now. the view is very beautiful. i've never seen anything like that before. there was 2 bright lights flashing red-blue and white. they were hovering over the st.Lawrence river. at first we thought it was a plane of a stard. they were moving slowly, up, down, left and right always around the same spot in the sky. thats why the theory of a plane or a star came impossible. right next to those lights, a triangular formation of lights (white-yellow lights) was clearly visible. all those things came on and off multiple times. when the triangle appeared for the first time, a dog near by start barking like i never heard a dog bark like. i think he noticed the thing too. he was completly scared (that's my theory.) the ufos were visible for about 1 hour or more. we were kind of nervous about the situation. i have interest for the ufo phenomenon for a couple of years. i have read about the subject, saw about 50 hours of documentery about it and i watch the sky regulary. but even with my moderate knowledge of the phenomenon, i wasn't prepare for that. i think we were king of scared but we didn't leave. it was just too incredible to me.

a short time after we moved to baie-comeau and i parked my car in an empty parking lot. we noticed again a strange light (blue-red and white) right next to the light, a formation of 5 bright lights came on. it was huge. it was completely symetrical. 3 vertical lights with 2 others on each side (including the first blue-red and white light). to me it was like a drawing of a giant flying saucer (but it wasn't a single objet.) the lights came off 30 minutes after. 

notice that the sky was full of clouds and the ufos were under. no stars were visible.

a friend of mine who is living in the city of rimouski saw some lights that looks very similar to the one that i've saw. rimouski is in the other side of the st.Lawrence river.

i have a computer assisted drawing. it's in french but i'm sure you will understand anyway.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright lights over baie-comeau,qc,canada .Objects were flashing red-blue and white. formation of lights were also visible.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and her friend were sitting at st. mary's beach in bradenton fl when her friend decided to take some pictures of the ocean with his iphone of the water. after he took the first photo he was surprised as he showed her what he had captured. in the picture was a super bright, perfect circle that was blue/white in color. she told him to take another picture but to move the phone to the right to see if it's in the picture again. when he held up his phone, neither one of them could see the object in the phone, or with the naked eye. he snaps the picture, looks and shows her that the object in fact was still in the picture, and it had moved with the camera. they were wondering if the light was some kind of refraction of light from the sun (which was also in the picture) so they took a third photo, at an even greater angle from the original picture. if you look at the photo you can actually use the stick/log that is on the beach as a point of reference to show that the object in fact is completely stationary in all three photos. another interesting thing is the fact that in the first photo you can almost see a reflection of the object in the water below it. decide for yourself what it is and feel free to contact me with questions.
content.summary: My sister and her friend were sitting taking pictures at the beach when they noticed a super bright blue/white light in the photos.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on near decatur and elkhorn at 7:00pm when i observed four amber lights in the sky appear and disappear one by one as they were traveling north towards the mountains. the sky was clear; the sun had already set and there were no airplanes in the sky.
content.summary: I observed 3-4 amber to orange lights in the sky at 6:57pm turning on and off while i drove my vehicle on north decatur

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to hang out with friends at an old camp park.On the way there i look to my cell phone and i have absolutely no sevice, and most the time i have full sevice. well when we get to the camp grounds we start talking and as it turns out i aint the only one. as night time gets closer and closer peolpe start to go to bed and its just me and 3 of my best friends. we had the radio up listening to megadeth when everything just shuts off. i mean everthing the car lights my phone,radio,everything. at that momemt one of my buddys yell out hoy **** guys, guys come look art this. i drop everthing and run over to the edge of the water where he is just freakin out. i asked him wht happened he tuned to me and said that a weird colored massive light shot up into the dark abyss we call the sky. shocked and not knowing hoe to react a big flash out ov nowhere almost blinds me like a fleshbang granade. this light seperated into hundreds of lights cicling around then stopping as if they were send ing morse code of some sorts. or using the stars as a navigation type deal. after abut an hour or so the lights came together and sunk back under water.
content.summary: Shape shifting beautiful lights. i could not look away
